name: East Kelowna Experience
wineryDescription: Art-forward winery known for vibrant tasting rooms and live events.
tastingDescription: Guided tasting of five featured estate wines.

name: Okanagan Lake Connection
wineryDescription: Lakeside winery with dockside views and relaxed tastings.
tastingDescription: Four-wine tasting with small bites by the water.

name: Summerhill Organic Adventure
wineryDescription: Organic winery known for its pyramid cellar and sparkling wines.
tastingDescription: Estate organic tasting featuring diverse varietals.

name: Quails' Gate Reserve Tour
wineryDescription: Lakeside family-owned winery famed for Pinot Noir and scenic vineyard views.
tastingDescription: Reserve tasting with guided vineyard stroll.

name: Cedar Creek Platinum Tour
wineryDescription: Organic-focused winery with modern architecture and mountain views.
tastingDescription: Platinum-tier tasting and barrel room experience.

name: Mission Hill Family Estate Tour
wineryDescription: Iconic winery with panoramic lake views and award-winning wines.
address: 1730 Mission Hill Rd, West Kelowna, BC

name: Mt. Boucherie Vineyard Tour
wineryDescription: Modern winery producing bold, estate-grown reds.

name: Indigenous World Winery Tour
wineryDescription: Indigenous-owned winery blending culture with modern winemaking.
tastingDescription: Cultural tasting flight featuring regional varietals.

name: Tantalus Heritage Tour
wineryDescription: Historic Riesling-focused winery with valley views.
